attributes.description: At KIA Diepriver we pride ourselves on delivering quality Pre-Owned vehicles. All our vehicles undergo a Dekra Condition Report and a quality check at our workshop for that peace of mind motoring. The one thing we pride ourselves in more than anything is EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. Come and join our KIA Diep River Family where trust and service are our main focus. We will tailor make a package that will suit your needs. We deal through all major financial institutions and always pride ourselves on giving you the best deal.
